name: Slice&Dices
description:
READ ME!
mute the sound?... our sounds are made of placeholder so it won't be great.
How to play:
Each dice roll will give you an active skill as long as you don't reroll these dice, you can reroll indefinitely, make sure your combination of skills is appropriate to the obstacle you're facing!

-"1", "2", "3" to roll each one of the 3 dices
-"Shift" for Dash (when active)
-"E" to Shield (when active)
-"Spacebar" to jump (Press twice to "double jump" when active)
-" Mouse Left Click" to slice the vines (when active)
-Get close to a horizontal wall to grip it (when active)

Yellow > Dash ( reduce the cooldown for each simultaneous buff)
Green > Double Jump (Add an extra jump for each simultaneous buff)
Red > Allow you to strike and destroy obstacles
Blue > Shield ( reduce the cooldown for each simultaneous buff)
White > Movespeed (increase even more for each simultaneous buff)
Orange > Allow you to grip onto a wall

The demo ends when you meet a ghost, have fun & thanks for playing!
